alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Camden County through 445 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles north of Kings Bay Base, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cumberland Island. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
